A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you've been waiting years for Luke to be trashed and flattened into a failure with a minimal flashback with no basis in his character or what is shown on screen then this is the piece of junk for you. \"This one changes everything\" is an apt snippet. Too many plot holes and contradictory ideas. Thematically the film hammers the idea of learning from failure and the Myth of heroism which how it was done was not right for Star Wars. Boo hiss. \"That's not true. That's impossible!\" Is how I felt.
